Html: My experience is mostly with VS 2003. In installing a project like this under VS2003, I just created a new website and dragged and dropped the files into the project. When I try doing this with these files into a VS2005 website, I have over 100 errors. I am sure there is an easy way to install this. I did not have any of the codegen files for the variables (.designer.vb files) and it does not seem to recognize the methods in the APP_Code directory. I added the bin files to the references. Any ideas?
